# This file is autogenerated by always_run.py
# Do not edit this file directly

ciso_do_every_measure_with_ci = {
	set_local_variable = {
		name = ciso_raw_alloc_total
		value = 0
	}
	flag:ciso_ms_soup_kitchen = {
		save_scope_as = measure
	}
	set_local_variable = {
		name = ciso_raw_alloc_ciso_ms_soup_kitchen
		value = {
			value = {
				value = $ci$_weight
				divide = local_var:lambda
				round_to = 0.1
				pow = 0.5
			}
			multiply = ciso_B
			subtract = ciso_B
			subtract = var:ciso_ciso_ms_soup_kitchen_ci_investment_var
		}
	}
	change_local_variable = {
		name = ciso_raw_alloc_total
		add = local_var:ciso_raw_alloc
	}
	set_local_variable = {
		name = ciso_raw_alloc_total
		value = 0
	}
	change_variable = {
		name = ciso_ciso_ms_soup_kitchen_ci_investment_var
		add = {
			value = local_var:ciso_raw_alloc_ciso_ms_soup_kitchen
			multiply = local_var:ciso_raw_alloc_scale
		}
	}
}
